home.intro: Hello, I'm Joel - a passionate Jr. Full Stack Web Developer with a particular love for the creativity of front-end development. Originally from L.A., CA, I was raised in Miami, FL, and have been calling Germany home since 2017. My coding journey began in early 2023, and I'm proud to have recently earned my Full Stack Web Developer certification from Le Wagon Berlin. I’m excited to share my portfolio with you and invite you to explore the different projects and pages on my website. Thank you for visiting, and I hope you enjoy what you see! Have a wonderful day.
home.pinia: The Pinia Global App State Manager
home.garden: Joel at Miami Beach Botanical Garden

contact.title: Contact
contact.contact_message: Currently available for junior-level roles in frontend, backend, or full-stack web development. I am interested in opportunities that allow me to grow professionally while delivering clean, maintainable code and supporting team objectives. Inquiries regarding employment are welcome—please use email link bellow.

about.gym_backface: Weekly, I go to the gym 4 times and I jog.
about.travel_alt: Traveling the world through an airplane window
about.travel_backface: New food, culture, beaches, rivers, mountains. I also love airplanes and flying. What more can I say?
about.video_games_alt: Picture of a man raging after losing in COD
about.video_games_backface: I love the competition and the difficulty and excitement of FPS.
about.cooking_backface: I love a good dish weather mexican, italian, french, or german. Good food is a passion
about.beach_backface: Relaxing in the sun while floating in warm water is so me!
